School Management System (Tkinter)

gui.qt_app module

PyQt5 GUI: School Management System

Uses your existing domain & persistence code: - src/models/{person.py,student.py,instructor.py,course.py} - src/persistence/json_store.py (save_to_json, load_from_json) - src/validation/validators.py

Run from the project root (folder that contains src/):

python -m src.gui.qt_app

or

python src/gui/qt_app.py
